message: Let's be reasonable, I'll take a bit more but you'll still get a good amount
I understand you wanting a larger share, but I'm sure we can find a more balanced solution that benefits us both.
I'll lower my share a bit, but I still think I deserve the larger portion
Time is running out, and we both lose if we don't agree. This is a fair offer considering the circumstances.
I'll meet you halfway between my last offer and yours, but that's as low as I'm willing to go
Alice, we're getting dangerously close to losing everything. I'm making a significant concession here to close the deal. This is my final offer.
I know you said that was your final offer, but I'm not buying it. You're losing value every round, I'm not. Take this or we'll keep playing
